Sun, 25 Aug 2013 15:11:27 +0200

This is ODE 0.12, downloaded from:
http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/opende/ODE/0.12/ode-0.12.tar.bz2

Downloaded premake4.exe version 4.3 from:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/premake/files/Premake/4.3/premake-4.3-windows.zip
(The version of premake shipped with ODE does not support VS2010)

Run "premake4.exe vs2010" in the build directory to generate the VS2010 solution.

Compiled in ReleaseSingleLib and ReleaseDoubleLib modes using
Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 Express and Windows SDK 7.1 on Windows 7 x64.

ODE is dual licensed; you may choose between the LGPLv2 or BSD License.

~rdb
